name: Virtuoso Lich
description: The Virtuoso Lich is a twisted master of artistry, sporting an imposing presence with a skeletal frame embodying both elegance and menace. Its darkly beautiful enhancements evoke a haunting aura, as it channels corrupted forms of artistic expression.
memorable: Combines spellcasting prowess with artistic abilities, capable of charming enemies and healing allies.
goals: To master art and magic, manipulate foes, and regain power through its phylactery.
relations: Often leads other undead or minions in its quest for artistic dominance.
environment: Typically found in dark, abandoned theaters, art studios, or crypts rich with history.
strengths: Legendary Resistance and Rejuvenation allow it to avoid permanent defeat, while its versatile spellcasting enables control over the battlefield.
weaknesses: Reliant on its phylactery for resurrection; can be strategically targeted to prevent its return.
attacks: Uses its Multiattack to unleash Corrupted Art followed by Artistic Flourish attacks, each infused with varied forms of magical damage.
most_powerful_ability: Call Muse allows it to incapacitate a target, making them vulnerable to its attacks.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and darkness.
skills: Excels in Deception and Persuasion, enhancing its manipulative abilities.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and various conditions.
Can choose a form of artistic expression for damage immunity each long rest.
Gains temporary hit points when healing undead through its abilities.
Legendary actions allow for flexibility in combat and further battlefield manipulation.
Spellcasting includes control and utility spells like charm and dimension door.
spellcasting: 12th-level spellcaster specializing in bard spells, including both utility and charm effects.
test_queries: lich that charms creatures with art
powerful enemy with damage immunity options
